author: National Bureau
text:
The Parliamentary Standing Committee on Home Affairs will visit the Pathankot airbase, the site of a terror attack last month, on Wednesday. Committee Chairperson P.Bhattacharya of the Congress confirmed this to The Hindu .

“Yes, we will be visiting the Pathankot airbase on Wednesday as part of our committee work,” Mr.Bhattacharya said.

Earlier, on January 15, the committee had asked for a briefing from Home Secretary Rajiv Mehrishi on the attack, to which he had replied that facts were still being collated.

“We have been trying to get information from the government on this matter, it is the right of members to know the details,” said a committee member.
title: Parliament panel to visit airbase in Pathankot
